Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT column_name FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns WHERE table_name = 'w2_DeliveryCompany' AND column_name = 'delivery_company_type_gmo_atokara_payment') BEGIN ALTER TABLE [w2_DeliveryCompany] ADD [delivery_company_type_gmo_atokara_payment] [nvarchar] (3) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_Payment WHERE payment_id = 'K40') BEGIN INSERT INTO w2_Payment ( shop_id, payment_group_id, payment_id, payment_alt_id, payment_name, payment_name_mobile, payment_price_kbn, payment_price, usable_price_min, usable_price_max, mobile_disp_flg, display_order, valid_flg, del_flg, date_created, date_changed, last_changed, user_management_level_not_use, order_owner_kbn_not_use ) values ( '0', '', 'K40', '', 'アトカラ', '', '0', 0, 1, null, '0', 40, '0', '0', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'Migration', '', '' ) END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_PaymentPrice WHERE payment_id = 'K40') BEGIN INSERT INTO w2_PaymentPrice ( shop_id, payment_group_id, payment_id, payment_price_no, tgt_price_bgn, tgt_price_end, payment_price, del_flg, date_created, date_changed, last_changed ) VALUES ( '0', '', 'K40', 1, 0, 0, 0, '0', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'Migration' ) END GO
